entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 31. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 40. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
